content.text:
# Magic Kingdom (band)

Magic Kingdom is a Belgian power metal band formed in 1998 by guitarist Dushan Petrossi.
Timeline
TimeAxis = orientation:horizontal format:yyyy
Legend = orientation:vertical position:bottom columns:1
ScaleMajor = increment:2 start:1998
ScaleMinor = increment:1 start:1998
Colors =
id:guitar  value:green     legend:Guitar
id:vocals  value:red       legend:Vocals
id:unclean value:claret    legend:Unclean_vocals
id:bass    value:blue      legend:Bass
id:drums   value:orange    legend:Drums
id:keys    value:purple    legend:Keyboards
id:lines   value:black     legend:Studio_album

at:05/17/1999 color:black layer:back
at:03/22/2004 color:black layer:back
at:10/29/2010 color:black layer:back
at:03/20/2015 color:black layer:back
at:11/22/2019 color:black layer:back
at:12/13/2024 color:black layer:back

Discography
*The Arrival (1999)
*Metallic Tragedy (2004)
*Symphony of War (2010)
*Savage Requiem (2015)
*MetAlmighty (2019)
*Blaze of Rage (2024)
